law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 640, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 1, effective March 23, 1998; and ch. 426, sec. 592, effective July 15, 1998. -- Contingent effective date repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 20, effective March 23, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 13, effective upon contingency.
